ABOUT HYDROPOWER

Engineering the
best solutionsEngineer

Hydropower Energy and General Construction (HPE) established in 1977, has grown into one of the most efficient and successful contractors in the region. Hydropower Energy (HPE) through years of experience, has built an engineering & contracting house with local and international expertise capable of competing for the most sophisticated and complex projects.

Power, Buildings and Facilities Management

CEO’s Message

In an ever-changing world, the need for clean water and energy is continuously growing. We are proud and honoured to have chosen this life journey of serving these needs and supplying people with these comforts. Our commitment, integrity and values in executing our tasks will never be compromised neither will our commitment to doing this by enhancing environmental values in our planet and by reducing our environmental footprint.

ILIAS ABDO
CEO

Travis Kirkpatrick, Owner
